phrases: Here is my license and my level certificate.
Oh my, you really are who you say you are.
I am Middle Class Exorcist Kaoru Tsubaki.
Anyway, I am taking this kid to the Japanese Branch Office.
And I want to talk to the head of the branch, Mephisto,
so bring him along even if you have got to use force.
I have a shitload of stuff I want to ask you.
Could you wait until we give him first aid?
And kids who still smell of milk should stay out of trouble.
Please head back to your dormitories right away.
Let me go, I cannot breathe!
Oh damn, I am so jealous...
By the way, who is that babe?
She is Yamada, is not she?
She is wearing male uniform trousers.
That Okumura, did he get into trouble again?
I do not know but it is not Rin's fault!
You have never been to the base, have you?
The center of the Japanese Branch of the Order of True Cross.
The headquarters are under St. Peter's Basilica in Rome,
and it coordinates the actions of the branches around the world.
The Order's history in exorcism spans over two millennia.
I did not think that a High Inspector would infiltrate the cram school.
Mephisto, give me a straight answer.
Why did you hide the son of Satan?
It was all for the sake of the Order.
For the sake of the Order?
Tame the son of Satan to become a weapon for the Order.
We Exorcists have been on the defensive for 2000 years,
now is our chance to take the offensive.
I was asking why you did not report to the Vatican.
As you can see, his powers are still incomplete.
Gregori would not be satisfied with something incomplete, would he?
Then I am going to ask you again.
Did Shiro Fujimoto have anything to do with this case?
He was raising him until his flames got stronger.
I was just keeping an eye on him.
Either way, I will have to report this.
But before that I got to interrogate him.
I will use the Great Cell.
You will be sorry for this.
It is pointless to question my brother.
You sure have not changed, Yukio.
Well okay, you did get taller.
Thanks for the trouble, go home and hit your bunk.
You sure were meek like a scared little kitty cat.
You knew my dad and Yukio?
Well... I was Shiro Fujimoto's apprentice.
Unfortunately I have never once prayed to God.
I grew up in a place outside the range of reason.
Shiro Fujimoto saved me from staying alive every day just for the sake of staying alive.
That was way before you two were born.
How could you fall for that?
Was this shit so cheap you will let anyone take it?
So the Demon-Slaying Blade cannot suppress his power completely?
You want me to take that scaredy four-eyes as my pupil?
Because you are familiar with using demon swords.
Are you going to give him a demon sword?
Giving a demon sword to a child is insanity.
But we have no other choice.
If something ever happens to me...
Please, teach him how to use his sword.
You were so cool and strong and perfect, what happened to you?!
Are you scared because you saw a glance of the end of your road?
You threw me away, and now you want to push that kid on me too?
Never show yourself in front of me again!
I wanted to believe in you.
I wanted to believe that you are the strongest.
Sever the head of the snake...
Why would my dad's apprentice point her sword at me?
The day Shiro died the Vatican headquarters dispatched me as High Inspector with secret orders.
There is a possibility that Shiro Fujimoto and Mephisto Pheles,
the head of the Japanese Branch, have been hiding something related to Satan
since the Blue Night 16 years ago.
And if by chance there was such an element,
you are hereby authorized to eliminate it upon identification.
I have confirmed your blue flames, the sign of Satan.
I will obey my orders and kill you.
The apprentice will finish her dead master's incomplete work.
Do not even bother trying to go in there.
The Great Cell can only be opened by High Class Exorcists.
We are to quietly wait until the interrogation ends.
It is just like with that demon earlier.
What were you trying to do, Shiro?
Why did you oppose the Vatican by hiding Satan's son?
Tame the son of Satan to become a weapon for the Order.
Is that what you tried to accomplish and lost your life for?
This blunt and untempered kid would not even scratch Satan.
and clung to some pointless hope.
I do not care if you were his apprentice or whatever,
I will not let you make fun of my dad!
He makes a lot of useless moves and he looks like he is got no idea of proper fighting techniques.
Did not you say you will not let me make fun of him?
If you will not come at me, I will have at you instead!
I vowed on his grave that I would become a great Exorcist like him and kick Satan's filthy ass!
I will become the strongest Exorcist and Paladin.
If I become Paladin everyone will have to accept that he was right!
Do not make me laugh you shitty brat!
Or I guess the joke's on me.
It is not like I did not!
Shiro, you were not raising weapon.
I will take care of it.
If it is with you, Amaimon will just come to play with you again.
If you want it back, get stronger.
You will get it back once you can kick my ass.
And you got to prove that Shiro was right.
I will postpone my report to the Vatican.
However, I will continue watching over Rin Okumura.
The point is, get a place for me at the Japanese Branch.
I have wonderful green tea ice cream from Uji.
Just what the hell are you planning?
My only wish is peace for humankind and Assiah.
I abandoned Gehenna and came here to serve that goal.
Do not forget that you are a demon and the higher-ups do not trust you.
Poor Brother, it looks like they have no trust in you.
I have plenty to discuss with you regarding this case.
Rin, what are you doing so early in the morning?
I was thinking about my dad.
Do you understand what you have just done?
You beat up your friends and they are suffering in a hospital now.
They called me a monster and they mocked me!
It is your fault for being so violent!
How can you raise a child like that?
He really looks like a demon!
If you keep on like this, you will be all alone.
Use your strength for someone else...
I want you to become a cool guy
with lots of friends and who is loved by the girls!
How can I be like that?
If you try hard to be nice to people,
one day you will become like that.
Can you hear me, Mr. Fujimoto?
Do not you look at me like that!
A tiny fist like yours cannot knock me down!
I will just have them checked out by some boobie-wonder nurses!
I wanted to be a cool adult like Dad.
Why are Father and Brother so obsessed with him?
And you got to prove that Shiro was right.
I am not smart enough to figure out the answers no matter how much time I spend thinking.
All I can do now is to empty my head and dash forward.
I was dispatched by the Vatican headquarters.
I am Shura Kirigakure, 18 years old.
I was taking classes with you guys for the past three months.
I am in charge of teaching you magic circles, seals and...
Why did you disguise yourself as a student?
Professor Neuhaus was our teacher for that class.
Why would he be transferred in the middle of the term?
You know, he can still take a break to take care of the kid.
Just ask the Principal if you care about it so much.
and no one woke me up even when the homeroom ended...
Do not just stand there with your excuses, come on in.
Just get to your seat already.
Now that you are all here, let us start the class.
Introduction to Sigils, from the part about mammomancy.
I will do it to become Paladin.
In relation to sauces about ancient geomancy...
It is the same as always.
The fun summer vacation has started.
This feels like some fun picnic, I am so excited!
I am telling you to keep your flames down.
What the hell was that just now?
True Cross Academy Earthquake Damages Report File
It is alright kokoro ni mo nai
sakete toorenai michi wa itsu kara ka konna datta
haite suteru hodo ni taikutsu datta
kizu darake ni natte try for pride
haite sutete mo kekkyoku taisetsu nanda
harewatari michi ni hikari wa sashita
Let us fight osore wa nai
Dark side in my heart is
the unerasable sadness of the past.
It is alright if I do not really mean it,
so I fire my blasters and stretch out my hands.
Since when has my way been unavoidable like this?
And now there is no one left...
I cry for my pride, I cannot bear it.
Ah, ah, ah, alone in my world.
An aria of love resounding through
this distorted reality of twisted prayers.
My dreams and tomorrow are collapsing,
because throwing away the lies would be boring.
try it for your pride, covered in wounds.
Ah, ah, ah, alone in my world.
Even so, I sing the song of love and
let its wish reach through this distorted world
to build our bonds and the tomorrow to come.
Throwing away the lies was important after all,
because this is my precious life.
Dark cloud in my heart is
disappearing and light is shining on the road I am on.
Let us fight, there is no fear.
mau chou no you ni hirari
koko wa dokoka betsu no sekai
juudaina ayamachi ni mo kizukazu ni
hito kara hito e to tsunagaru
totemo kirei de maru de kinu no ito
sore ga unmei to iu kusari nano ka
I am lightly fluttering in wondrous light
like a dancing butterfly in midair.
Is this place in another world?
My fall is not slowing down so
The numbers that make my head spin
and there I notice a terrible error.
is a shining pale indigo blue wire.
It is beautiful like a thread of silk.
I wonder if it is what they call the chains of fate?
You seek for it and yet you are already caught,
so do not try to struggle.
You are a beautiful fool in
the way you get entwined in this
You seek for it and yet you are already caught,
so do not try to struggle.
You are a beautiful fool in
the way you get entwined in it.
